properties.title: Obtaining a certificate for Apache Jakarta Tomcat

section.name: Obtaining a certificate for Apache Jakarta Tomcat
section.p:
The process is quite simple. Send an e-mail to the SensorNetCA requesting a Tomcat certificate. The e-mail should contain:
The ip name of your server
Your name and e-mail address
Your phone number
Your Organization
Your Organizational Unit
Your City
Your State
Your Country

The key store for your server will be generated by the CA, and is ready to use when you receive it. When your request is approved, I will mail you the tomcat.jks file containing your certificate. For security reasons, it would be best if you first obtain a personal SensorNet certificate so that I can send you encrypted e-mail.
Install the tomcat.jks file at the location pointed to in your tomcat ssl configuration file.
